casebody.data:
Albert L. KIRKNER, Brian C. McNew, and Trust Investment Group, LLC
v.
Michael S. GLASS, Margery Dana, and DGK Properties, LP Petition of: Michael S. Glass No. 354 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 17, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 17th day of September, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED .
